p: Cherry et al. ( 2014) described the surface air temperature (SAT) for the Toolik Field Station for the period 1989–2010 (Fig. 2). Here we update the annual data through 2014 (Fig. 2) and also separately analyze the air temperature in winter, spring, summer, and fall seasons (Fig. 3). Romanovsky et al. ( 2010) measured permafrost temperatures once a year since 1983 at a depth of 20 m in boreholes along the Dalton Highway.
